lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Banks and merchant banks accounted for 32 pct of the total, building societies 30 pct, life assurance companies 20 pct, insurance companies 11 pct and pension funds seven pct.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: K. Government bonds (gilts) and have become more active in the market since the deregulation of the London Stock Exchange in October, agency broker Capel-Cure Myers said in a survey.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Rather than being a self-contained, specialised group of dealers who spend all their time searching for prices, the definition now appears to be the less formal idea of a multi-purpose fund manager, it said.
